title: Sprunki Infected
description: Control a mischievous Sprunki through challenging levels, collecting healthy Sprunkies and defeating infected ones in this captivating puzzle game.

Home.title: Welcome to Sprunki Infected
Home.description: Dive into the fast-paced world of Sprunki Infected! Guide your soda-loving Sprunki through a series of challenging levels. Collect healthy Sprunkies, defeat the infected ones, and race against the clock in this addictive puzzle game. Test your reflexes and problem-solving skills in a colorful, energetic atmosphere!
Home.urlCopied: Sprunki Infected URL copied to clipboard!

desc.whatIsDescription: Sprunki Infected is a captivating puzzle game where you control a mischievous Sprunki, a soda-loving creature, through a series of challenging levels. Your mission is to collect all the healthy Sprunkies and defeat the infected ones before time runs out. With its fast-paced and addictive gameplay, Sprunki Infected offers a unique gaming experience.
desc.howToPlayStep1: Control Sprunki using the mouse or keyboard to move left, right, up, and down.
desc.howToPlayStep2: Search for and collect healthy Sprunkies scattered throughout the levels to increase your score.
desc.howToPlayStep3: Avoid or defeat infected Sprunkies by jumping on their heads.
desc.feature1Description: Navigate through a series of levels designed to test your reflexes and problem-solving skills.
desc.feature2Description: Beat the clock by collecting all healthy Sprunkies and defeating infected ones before time expires.
desc.feature3Description: Enjoy vibrant, eye-catching visuals that create a fun and energetic atmosphere.
desc.feature4Description: Experience fast-paced, engaging gameplay that keeps you coming back for more.
desc.movementControl1: Use the mouse to control Sprunki's direction
desc.movementControl2: Use arrow keys to move Sprunki left, right, up, and down
desc.interactionControl1: Collect healthy Sprunkies to increase your score
desc.interactionControl2: Jump on infected Sprunkies to defeat them
desc.interactionControl3: Avoid contact with infected Sprunkies to stay alive
desc.combatControl1: Complete levels within the given time limit
desc.combatControl2: Collect all healthy Sprunkies in each level
desc.combatControl3: Defeat or avoid all infected Sprunkies
desc.miscControl1: Plan your route to efficiently collect Sprunkies
desc.miscControl2: Prioritize defeating infected Sprunkies when necessary
desc.miscControl3: Balance speed and caution to beat the clock
